name: Web Development
description: Designing and developing responsive, modern, and high-performing websites tailored to meet business objectives and provide a seamless user experience.

name: SEO Optimization
description: Enhancing website visibility and ranking through keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO, and content strategies tailored to drive organic traffic and growth.

name: AI Automation
description: Integrating AI technologies into applications to enhance functionality, automate processes, and improve user experience through intelligent solutions.

name: Prototyping & Testing
description: Creating interactive prototypes and conducting user testing to validate design concepts, gather feedback, and ensure usability and functionality.
